# Homework

## Create Flow Charts for the following

1. Declare 3 variables, assign them with any string values you like, then display them in one row and display them in 3 separate rows.
2. Declare 2 variables, assign them with numbers, then display their sum, multiplication, subtract the first one from the second one, subtract the second one from the first one, divide the first one by the second one, and divide the second one by the first one.
3. Declare variables - first name, last name, email, and phone. Assign them with values, display the information in this format:

```
First Name:_______
Last Name:______
Email:_______
Phone:______
```

4. [Enably](https://apps.prod.timetoknow.com/index.html?site=johnbryce#/$/library), in `מבוא לתכנות ( 4559 + 4556 )` [here](https://apps.prod.timetoknow.com/index.html?site=johnbryce#/$/library/channel/803270d4-b55a-45b6-8f56-0930642e13b7/4578%2F80%20Full%20Stack?$/echoPlayer/params/channelId=803270d4-b55a-45b6-8f56-0930642e13b7&clk=2bA0z5w4/page/ac09835c-4406-1c75-5b35-f005eb3728a7)

- page 11, tasks: 1-8
- page 15, tasks: 1-6
- challenge - page 15, task: 8
